str2: Obadiah -- 'servant of Yah', the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular

str2: Against he come, help, meet, seek, to, in the way

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Hifil - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular

str2: Ahab -- 'father's brother', a king of Israel, also a false prophet

Elijah -- 'Yah is God', a well-known prophet of Israel, also three other Israelites
